content: Should packaging quantity in medication knowledge be the same than amount?
I'm not quite understanding your question. Can you expand a little bit?
We do have an outstanding issue about the definition/description of MedicationKnowledge.amount so we will be addressing.

In medicationknowledge we have MedicationKnowledge.amount that is describe as Amount of drug in package also in medicationknowledge we have MedicationKnowledge.Packaging.Quantity describe as The number of product units the package would contain if fully loaded. We are not clear about if these two fields mean the same.
I have added a JIRA issue to review and clarify this: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-25944
